ONEJOURNAL.Placeholder: All opened journals will show up here. Best viewed in fullscreen
ONEJOURNAL.JournalEntryDetached: Detached from OneJournal in a separate window
ONEJOURNAL.HistoryBackwardHint:
Go to previous Journal
Right-click to show history
ONEJOURNAL.HistoryForwardHint:
Go to next Journal
Right-click to show history
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsUseOneJournalHint: Use OneJournal to open all journal sheets
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsOpenButtonInSidebarDi: Add a button to the sidebar directory to open OneJournal
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsSidebarModeHint: Choose which side to show the sidebar
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsSidebarSyncHint: When opening a journal, focus the entry in the sidebar (with folder expansion/scrolling)
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsFolderSelectorHint: Show the default dropdown for choosing parent folder
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsNoDuplicateHistoryHin: By default, duplicated browsing history items are removed
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsUseBrowserHistoryHint: Browsing journals will use the browser history, requires window reload
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsGMOnlyHint: Only the GM can use OneJournal
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsSidebarFolderColorHin: Apply the folder color to the borders that surround folder contents
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsSidebarDisablePlayerH: OneJournal sidebar will only be available to the GM
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsDblClickEditHint: Double click anywhere in the journal entry to edit
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsSidebarWidthHint: Change the width of the sidebar
ONEJOURNAL.SettingsSidebarCompactHint: Make the sidebar directory a bit more compact
